movie.title: A Serial Killer's Guide to Life
movie.title_english: A Serial Killer's Guide to Life
movie.title_long: A Serial Killer's Guide to Life (2019)
movie.description_intro: A self-help addict unwittingly finds herself on a killing spree with her unhinged life coach.
movie.description_full: A self-help addict unwittingly finds herself on a killing spree with her unhinged life coach.

movies.title: The Legend of King Solomon
movies.summary: In this animation-feature, the ancient legends of King Solomon are humorously adapted for children, with a contemporary and fresh overtone. Adventure, magic, battles and love. The hopeful ending celebrates the crossing of borders between religions, nations and identities.
movies.description_full: In this animation-feature, the ancient legends of King Solomon are humorously adapted for children, with a contemporary and fresh overtone. Adventure, magic, battles and love. The hopeful ending celebrates the crossing of borders between religions, nations and identities.

movies.title: The Jungle Book
movies.summary: Living among the wolves in the jungle, young man cub Mowgli quickly learns to live life among his wolf pack and all the animals that inhabit the jungle, but when the villainous tiger Shere Khan threatens Mowgli's life, black panther Bagheera offers to take Mowgli to a nearby man village where he will be safe from the tiger's wrath. Along the way, Mowgli gets tangled up in a series of encounters with a sly snake named Kaa, a swimmingly ruthless gigantopithecus named King Louie and a lazy bear named Baloo, who quickly becomes his guide to the 'bear necessities' of life.

movies.title: Once
movies.summary: An unnamed guy is a Dublin guitarist/singer/songwriter who makes a living by fixing vacuum cleaners in his Dad's Hoover repair shop by day, and singing and playing for money on the Dublin streets by night. An unnamed girl is a Czech who plays piano when she gets a chance, and does odd jobs by day and takes care of her Mom and her daughter by night. Guy meets girl and they get to know each other as the girl helps the guy put together a demo disc that he can take to London in hope of landing a music contract. During the same several day period, the guy and the girl work through their past loves, and reveal their budding love for one another, through their songs.

movies.title: You Can't Kill Stephen King
movies.summary: A group of friends visit a lake where horror author Stephen King lives, and start getting killed off one at a time.
movies.description_full: A group of friends visit a lake where horror author Stephen King lives, and start getting killed off one at a time.
